item.title: PhD PROGRAM
item.description: Why a PhD in applied Data Science and Artificial Intelligence? The aim of this new PhD programme at UNITS is to provide students with the modern tools of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, preparing them to create new data analysis methods and giving them the expertise to apply cutting-edge tools to problems in the real world. Our research spans from theoretical to applied aspects of data science and machine learning, aiming at understanding how modern methodologies became popular, framing their limitations and highlighting their possibility of extension.
